CustomField.description:
These are the instructions for using the FLO Audit / Approval Path record.
FLO Audit / Approval Path records have two functions:
1. They group processes and customizations into groups for various purposes including audit.
2. They define the approval rules for changes to processes and customizations.
These rules override a basic rules that every change must be tied to a business process and that the change must be approved by the owner of that process.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: These are the instructions for using the FLO Audit / Approval Path record.
CustomField.label: Instructions:
